heartstone

Class Assassin

  • java.lang.Object
    • heartstone.AbstractCard
      • heartstone.Assassin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card

    public class Assassin
extends AbstractCard
    Assassin is a type of Card with some specifications in certain methods, also it defines the abstract method attack to work for the Assassin subclass.
    Since:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Daniel Araya.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Assassin(java.lang.String name, double lifePoints, double attack)
      Creates an Assassin card, initially the damage counter is 0.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack(Card card)
      applies the attackedByAssassin method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
      void attackedByDruid(double attack)
      the damage counter of the Assassin remains the same, and increases the Assassin's attack by half of the Druid's attack value.
      void attackedByWarlock(double attack)
      increases the damage counter of the Assassin by double of the Warlock's attack value.

      • Methods inherited from class heartstone.AbstractCard

        attackedByAssassin, attackedByHealer, attackedByHunter, attackedByKnight, attackedByMage, attackedByPaladin, attackedByShaman, getAttack, getDamage, getLife, getName, isDead, kill

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Assassin

        public Assassin(java.lang.String name,
                double lifePoints,
                double attack)
        Creates an Assassin card, initially the damage counter is 0.
        Parameters:
        name - Assassin's name
        lifePoints - Assassin's life points
        attack - Assassin's attack value

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public void attack(Card card)
        applies the attackedByAssassin method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
        Specified by:
        attack in interface Card
        Specified by:
        attack in class AbstractCard
        Parameters:
        card - Card to attack.

      • attackedByDruid

        public void attackedByDruid(double attack)
        the damage counter of the Assassin remains the same, and increases the Assassin's attack by half of the Druid's attack value.
        Specified by:
        attackedByDruid in interface Card
        Overrides:
        attackedByDruid in class AbstractCard
        Parameters:
        attack - Druid's attack attribute.

      • attackedByWarlock

        public void attackedByWarlock(double attack)
        increases the damage counter of the Assassin by double of the Warlock's attack value.
        Specified by:
        attackedByWarlock in interface Card
        Overrides:
        attackedByWarlock in class AbstractCard
        Parameters:
        attack - Warlock's attack attribute.
